/*
    Aleksandar "Al3kSaNdaR" Ivanovic

    BALPRIME
*/
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

bool Mark[100000000 + 5];

int N, T, Cnt;

vector < int > A, B;

int main ( void )
{
    for ( int i = 2; i <= 1000000; i++ )
    {
        if ( Mark[i] ) continue;

        A.push_back ( i );

        for ( int j = i; j <= 1000000; j += i ) Mark[j] = true;
    }

    scanf ( "%d", &T );

    int Cnt = A.size ( );

    for ( int i = 1; i < Cnt - 1; i++ ) if ( A[i] * 2 == A[i - 1] + A[i + 1] ) B.push_back ( A[i] );

    while ( T-- )
    {
        scanf ( "%d", &N );

        N--;

        printf ( "%d\n", B[N] );
    }

    return 0;
}
